@overload
def kronsum(
    A: sparray[Any, Any],
    B: SparseArray[Any] | npt.ArrayLike,
    format: Literal["{_Spec_Format}"],
) -> {_Spec_Format}_array[Any, Any]: ...
@overload
def kronsum(
    A: SparseArray[Any] | npt.ArrayLike,
    B: sparray[Any, Any],
    format: Literal["{_Spec_Format}"],
) -> {_Spec_Format}_array[Any, Any]: ...
